byline.contributor: Hannah Olivennes contributed reporting from London.

abstract: Military unit that staged coup in Burkina Faso flout agreement brokered by African leaders to lay down their arms; interim government accuses members of regiment loyal to ousted Pres Blaise Compaore of kidnapping soldiers sent to disarm them and appealing to jihadist groups for help.
lead_paragraph: A political standoff in Ouagadougou threatens to plunge the West African country back into violence as a deal brokered last week did not take hold as planned.

headline.main: Burkina Faso Coup Plotters Refuse to Give Up Arms, Imperiling Deal
headline.print_headline: Burkina Faso Coup Plotters Refuse to Give Up Arms, Imperiling Deal

snippet: A political standoff in Ouagadougou threatens to plunge the West African country back into violence as a deal brokered last week did not take hold as planned.

keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
